<<<<<<< HEAD
Pathmos: or, A commentary on the Reuelation of Saint Iohn diuided into three seuerall prophecies. The first prophecie contained in the fourth, fift, sixt and seuenth chapters. By Mr. William Cowper, Bishop of Galloway. Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
[16], 346, [10] p.
Printed by George Purslow, for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the signe of the greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1619.
The first leaf is blank. Includes index. Running title reads: A commentarie vpon the Reuelation. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======

[16], 346, [10] p.
Printed by George Purslow, for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the signe of the greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1619.
The first leaf is blank. Includes index. Running title reads: A commentarie vpon the Reuelation. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
